original_text: And who, as I, shall call, and shall declare it, and set it in order for me, since I appointed the ancient people? and the things that are coming, and shall come, let them shew unto them.
korean_text: 내가 영원한 백성을 세운 이후로 나처럼 외치며 알리며 나에게 설명할 자가 누구냐 있거든 될 일과 장차 올 일을 그들에게 알릴지어다

sentences.original_text: And who, as I, shall call
and set it in order for me
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 위해 그것을 순서대로排列할 것인가

sentences.original_text: since I appointed the ancient people?
and the things that are coming
